item.title: Rarejob no13
item.description: We talked mainly about anime. I feel that many of the teachers at RareJob are anime lovers. We also talked about novels. I talked about the book I read last year , “I am Yellow, White, and alittle Blue”, so I told her I had read that book. But I thought it was a mistake to tell her this because this book is hard to explain. The teacher told me that I could search and translate the book and explain it, so I managed to explain the story.

item.title: rarejob no.12
item.description: Because the teacher spoke slowly, I was enjoyable lesson time with her. She also pointed out mistakes along the way. She told me about a video streaming site called viu. I was told that I could watch the Filipino version of “Why in the world is Secretary Kim? is available there.

item.title: rarejob no.11
item.description: I talked about dramas and movies, but couldn’t talk about details. She told me I looked young. Like a college student, she said. Maybe it’s because I have short bangs.

item.title: rarejob no.10
item.description: Teacher was so kind. Because she spoke clearly, I could easily hear what she was saying. Correcting mistakes You said Correct Once on two months. Once every two months. Once half year. Once every six months. I think Starbucks coffee don’t delicious than other coffee shops. I think Starbucks coffee is not as delicious as the coffee from other coffee shops. When I was child…. When I was a child….

item.title: rarejob no.9
item.description: I talked about traveling. Correcting mistakes You said Correct I went to there with my boyfriend. I went there with my boyfriend. I have three times trip a year. I travel three times a year.

item.title: rarejob no.8
item.description: I forgot to write down my impressions after this lesson. I think wo talked about Korean doramas and Japanese anime as usual.

item.title: rarejob no.7
item.description: I told him that I was going to Cebu in the Philippines next month to study language. Correcting mistakes You said Better I have first to study abroad. It will be my first time studying abroad. She’s act in Itaewon Class. She’s acted in Itaewon Class. I have first kOrean drama.crash landing on you..my first. The first Korean drama that I watched was Crash Landing on you. Yes, he is also like.

item.title: rarejob no.6
item.description: Her’s pronunciation was good and easy to listen to. However, I coundn’t understand the phrases and had to listen to them over and over again. I would like to take the class again. Correcting mistakes You said Correct I don’t watch Korean’s movie. I don’t watch Korean movies.

item.title: rarejob no.5
item.description: I wasn’t good at this lesson.

item.title: rarejob no.4
item.description: I was talking about my favirite. Correcting mistakes You said Correct Currently, I don’t sports. Currently, I don’t play any sports. six day in week six days a week I bought clothes every season. I buy clothes every season. I don’t like go out. I don’t like going out. Both of them is cute… Both of them are cute…

item.title: rarejob no.3
item.description: I chose the lesson of conversation question. My teacher was so kind and laughed a lot. She is also like korean drama. She also watched korean drama called What’s Wrong with Secretary Kim?. Things I wanted to say but couldn’t I used to read a lot of books, but now I hardly read any. I often go to Yoyogi Park. There are many people enjoying picnics on the grass in that park.

item.title: rarejob no.2
item.description: I chosen conversation question lesson. I said ‘I like the harry potter series movie’. teacher also like it. she has books of harry potter series. furthermore it is special edition!

item.title: rarejob no.1
item.description: I have first lesson in rarejob. I chosen 日常英会話 Level 3. At first, we were introduce myself. I say ‘I like k-pop idol and anime’. Correcting mistakes You said Correct I’m watch TV I’m watching TV I see Connie Go. I saw Connie Go (on TV).
